page.title: 12CUSTOMS.THE ANNUAL FETE.
page.content: Any one driving along the B4221 going past Gorsley Goffs School on the last Saturday in June would have seen a hub of activity,a giant football,a huge "television" and scores of people rushing around.You want to know the reason why ? It was the annual school fete.This event has been the highlight of Gorsley village for over 15 years taking over from the Flower Show. For many weeks people had been preparing for this most prestidious day of the year in Gorsley's calender. The attractions included an inflatable castle,crockery smashing,handi_crafts, tombola,traction engine rides and many others. The highlight of the day must have been the "Knockout"between Asfield, Llangrove,Goodrich and Gorsley.Â£1080 was raised for the P.T.A. funds.
